name: lib/index.js
ResourceController
before
description: Add middlewares before request handler to current scope

name: after
description: Add middlewares after request handler to current scope

name: scope
description:
Add scoped address, before/after handlers and simple handlers.
Before/After handlers is inherits from parent scope.
Scopes don't merging. Use only one scope for unique path.

name: local
description: Add HTTP method listeners to local

name: post
description: Handle POST HTTP method with single or many handlers

params.name: name
params.description: Route path. Default is current scope

name: resourceOptions
examples:
<caption>Method names</caption>
const Controller = {
  createDemo() {},
  updateMe() {},
  justExample() {},
  youDontNeedThis() {},
}
createRest(r => {
  r.resource('demo', Controller, { methodNames: {
    read: 'justExample', create: 'createDemo', update: 'updateMe', destroy: 'youDontNeedThis',
  }})
})

properties.name: only
properties.description: Keep only that handlers: `[read, create, update, destroy]`

name: resource
description:
Create CRUD methods for single resource.

Resources not merging. Use only one resource for path.

params.name: name
params.description: Name of the resource. Create route path from

description: Print routes to console and string
